title: Subway [Dubbed]
creator_credit: Luc Besson, Francois Ruggieri, TFI Films, Gaumont-British Instructional, TSF Production and Les Films du Loup
brief_description: This strange combination of action, comedy, violence and suspense tells the story of a cool rebel on the run, who uses the dark tunnels of the Paris subway as his hideout. There he meets a wide assortment of unusual characters. Stars Christopher Lambert and Isabelle Adjani. The soundtrack has been dubbed into English.
